name: tapgreet
tag_list: mobile, local, social, vending, greeting-card, ipad, iphone, android, retail, consumer, merchandise
overview: Tapgreet Inc. offers high-quality greeting cards through its network of conveniently located, self-service kiosks. Users select their favorite greeting cards using their mobile or laptop device, on-the-go or at the convenience of their home or office. They then pay for and pick up their greeting cards for the occasion, at their convenience, from a nearby Tapgreet kiosk. For more information, visit www.tapgreet.com.

milestones.description: Paul and Amin meet over coffee for the first time and after a few hours of chatting, commit to the same vision.
milestones.source_description: Co-Founders shake hands for the first time.

milestones.description: Tapgreet launches its first experimental, honor-based, kiosks in 3 locations: Cafe Capriccio and Espresso Roma (Fillmore) in San Francisco, and Espresso Roma on College Ave. in Berkeley.
milestones.source_description: Tapgreet launches in San Francisco and Berkeley

video_embeds.description: CBS San Francisco Local News breaks the news of seeing Tapgreet kiosks pop up in various coffeeshops around the Bay Area.
